title: Best of The Herd: 11/22/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/22/2019
description:
Colin explains why having a special talent at QB gets you a lot of wins even when you're outplayed and out coached like the Texans win on Thursday night. He thinks the Cowboys will shock the NFL on Sunday by beating the Patriots and explains why. He says this 49ers dream season could turn into a nightmare by Sunday night. Plus, FS1 Instigator Rob Parker talks about Cowboys/Patriots and why he's not buying the Lakers yet.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
